description:
Explore your favourite trails in winter. Hollow aluminum frame pairs with Hypalon decking to create a lightweight and durable snowshoe. Traction rails and crampons underfoot lets you tackle steeper sections with confidence. Quick-pull bindings adjust to fit trail runners, mountaineering boots and everything in between.

  • Rigid aluminum frame borrows tech from Komperdell trekking poles for a uniquely strong, lightweight base
  • Lightweight Hypalon deck provides great float and sheds snow
  • Traction rails and crampons are positioned on pressure points of the foot for optimal grip
  • Bindings have a quick-pull system to secure your foot in place
  • Heel lifts add comfort and efficiency when going uphill
name: Komperdell Trailmaster Snowshoe T25 - Unisex
